Option1: This data is held in appsettings.json

JwtIssuerOptions.AccessValidForComment: Lifetime in seconds of non-secure AccessToken.  Should be short lived and frequently refreshed to reduce security exposure and ensure its data is recent.
JwtIssuerOptions.AccessClockSkewComment: Time in seconds to allow for differences in clocks when considering access token validity
JwtIssuerOptions.RefreshValidForComment: Lifetime in seconds of secure RefreshToken. Long lived, MUST be stored securely.  Client should refresh about 10s before expiration to extend session.
JwtIssuerOptions.RefreshClockSkewComment: Time in seconds to allow for differences in clocks when considering refresh token validity
